name: FlowerPower
0:
”Alexa, open flower power”
”Alexa, start flower power”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: flower power
des:
Listen to this interactive story with a timeless lesson. 
Two children you name, think of flowers as flower power, everlasting youth, the power of imagination, strong medicine and a real offering to the divine. Maybe child play is your idea of freedom. Take your children to the meadows to play 'drone' all day, in the larger flowers, Can you land a drone on one as effortlessly as bees and butterflies do? Maybe you can improve your dexterity and partake in this wilderness therapy, and play drone all day in the woods.
At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
